articles.title: Australia was seen as a world leader in gun control - Bondi has exposed a more complicated reality - BBC
articles.description: It introduced stricter gun laws after the 1996 Port Arthur massacre, but some say they now need to be tightened further.
articles.content:
Hundreds of thousands of guns were handed in across Australia during the last major government buyback scheme
It was a Sunday afternoon in April 1996 when a lone gunman armed with semi-automatic rif… [+12406 chars]
